fpmExplorer:Page.title: Chart with Filter Bar
fpmExplorer:Page.introduction: Linking the Chart building block to the FilterBar building block enables you to provide filtering capabilities. This example shows a chart with a filter bar that allows users to filter the data displayed in the chart.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: The Chart building block can be connected to a FilterBar using the filterBar property to enable interactive filtering.
